articles.title: Tick attack: BBC hunts for tiny bloodsuckers as diseases rise - BBC.com
articles.description: A closer look at the tiny, disease-carrying pests that are becoming more common in the UK.
articles.content:
James Gallagher inspects some of the captured ticks 
Am I the hunter or the hunted?
It's the question running through my mind as I stroll through the long grass and bracken.

articles.title: New research finds lake under Mars ice cap unlikely - Phys.org
articles.description: Cornell University researchers have provided a simple and comprehensive—if less dramatic—explanation for bright radar reflections initially interpreted as liquid water beneath the ice cap on Mars' south pole.
